column1: #text=I wanted to read a new novel , but rather than buying it , I decided to borrow it from the library .
#text=When I arrived at the library , I was greeted by the friendly librarian who asked if I needed any help .
#text=I told her which book I was looking for and she quickly helped me find it .
#text=After she helped me find the book , I walked to the checkout counter with the book .
#text=I handed the librarian my library card , which she scanned with a scanner .
#text=She opened the book to find the bar code in the back cover and proceeded to scan it .
#text=The computer printed a receipt which told me that I had two weeks to return the book .
#text=I placed the receipt inside the front cover of the book and thanked the librarian for helping me find the book I was looking for .
